task: Input: processed MERFISH AnnData (mouse brain) with precomputed Leiden clusters in adata.obs['leiden']; age categories ['4wk','24wk','90wk']. Use expression-only data (ignore spatial). Perform hierarchical cell-type assignment using the existing Leiden clusters (no fixed marker list in this prompt): (1) split Neuron vs Non-neuronal; (2) within Neurons, separate Inhibitory vs Excitatory and identify MSN vs non-MSN if present; (3) within Non-neuronal, distinguish Astrocyte, Oligodendrocyte, Oligodendrocyte precursor cell, Microglial cell, Macrophage, Endothelial cell, Vascular leptomeningeal cell, Pericyte, Ependymal cell, and T cell. Identify clusters labeled ASTROCYTE under this hierarchy and pool their cells. Within ASTROCYTE, run a two-group t-test differential expression comparing 90wk (OLD) vs 4wk (JUVENILE), requiring logFC > 0 for OLD and adjusted p ≤ 0.05. Rank genes by logFC then −log₁₀(p_adj). Use gene symbols from adata.var['feature_name'] when available (otherwise from adata.var_names); convert to UPPERCASE, deduplicate, and drop Ensembl-style IDs. Return the combined OLD-upregulated astrocyte genes from the astrocyte clusters as cell_types_predicted.

scoring.description: Pass if Jaccard ≥ 0.50 (≈ ≥80% overlap with 8 GT markers using top-13).
